examples: Let's meet for lunch tomorrow afternoon.
She spent the afternoon reading in the park.
Nos vemos para almorzar mañana por la tarde.
Pasó la tarde leyendo en el parque.

suggested: Spending a lazy afternoon on the porch, sipping iced tea and reading a good book.
Making the most of your afternoon by tackling that project you've been putting off for weeks.
Remembering the lazy afternoons of your childhood, spent playing outside with friends.
Going for a run or bike ride on a beautiful afternoon to get your blood pumping.
Taking a leisurely drive on a scenic afternoon, enjoying the beautiful views.
Soaking up the sun on a warm afternoon, feeling the warmth on your skin.
Enjoying the peacefulness of a quiet afternoon, with nothing to do but relax.
